Email

Connect and communicate

All staff, students and postgraduates are entitled to a University email account.

Wi-Fi and wired internet

Connect and communicate

eduroam is the main wireless network for staff, associates and students.

Printing

Desktops and devices

The UoN Print Service is available in all libraries and most computer rooms.

Office 365

Software

Office 365 suite of applications and productivity services for all staff and students.

Software

Software

A range of up-to-date software to support staff and students in their work, studies or research.

IT accounts and passwords

Connect and communicate

Key information about your IT account including how to access Wi-Fi, email, make calls and work remotely on and off campus.

Working off campus

Connect and communicate

Ways to access your University data, systems and applications remotely and when to use them.

Filestore

Data storage

The University offers file storage solutions for students, staff and researchers.

MyNottingham app

Connect and communicate

Access to timetables, maps, programme materials and guides, all accessible through your phone, helping you make the most of your time at University

Research Information System (RIS)

Research support

An easy-to-use web-based system designed to decrease the administrative burden of managing the research lifecycle.

Campus Solutions

Teaching and learning

Campus Solutions is used by staff to administer student records. Students also use the system (MyNottingham website) to apply to the University and update their details.
